title: Is Indo Pak script of the Quran permissible to read? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: aki says is hindu pak script of a quran permissible to use i think it's called al-majidi script and it is a script that is approved by the scholars and even the print house in medina which known to print the mushaf of king fahad complex in medina which most of the copies of the quran we have now worldwide is from there also has a script of of the majida script printed so that the urdu people could relate to it and read it and there's no nothing wrong in using it inshallah you
